short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto Info is a web site that wants you to know the price of crypto coins all the time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crypto Info is a web site that wants you to know the price of crypto coins all the time. Crypto Info is a extension that helps you monitor price and of ALL Cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Dash? Everything inside!

CryptoInfo notifies you when the price of a currency changes its value, just mark the currency you want and that's it.
